From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

French

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin dīminuō.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /di.mi.nɥe/
  • Audio:(file)
  • Audio (France (Lyon)):(file)
  • Audio (France (Somain)):(file)

Verb

[edit]

diminuer

  1. to diminish
  2. to decrease

Conjugation

[edit]
Conjugation of diminuer (see also Appendix:French verbs)
infinitive simple diminuer
compound avoir + past participle
present participle or gerund1 simple diminuant
/di.mi.nɥɑ̃/
compound ayant + past participle
past participle diminué
/di.mi.nɥe/
singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative je (j’) tu il, elle, on nous vous ils, elles

imperative – tu – nous vous –
simple — diminue
/di.mi.ny/ 		— diminuons
/di.mi.nɥɔ̃/ 		diminuez
/di.mi.nɥe/ 		—
compound — simple imperative of avoir + past participle — simple imperative of avoir + past participle simple imperative of avoir + past participle —
1 The French gerund is usable only with the preposition en.
2 In less formal writing or speech, these tenses may be found to have been replaced in the following way:
past historic → present perfect
past anterior → pluperfect
imperfect subjunctive → present subjunctive
pluperfect subjunctive → past subjunctive

(Christopher Kendris [1995], Master the Basics: French, pp. 77, 78, 79, 81).

Antonyms

[edit]
  • augmenter

Further reading

[edit]
  • “diminuer”, in Trésor de la langue française informatisé [Digitized Treasury of the French Language], 2012.

Interlingua

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

diminuer

  1. to decrease

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of diminuer
infinitive diminuer
participle present perfect
diminuente diminuite
active simple perfect
present diminue ha diminuite
past diminueva habeva diminuite
future diminuera habera diminuite
conditional diminuerea haberea diminuite
imperative diminue —
passive simple perfect
present es diminuite ha essite diminuite
past esseva diminuite habeva essite diminuite
future essera diminuite habera essite diminuite
conditional esserea diminuite haberea essite diminuite
imperative sia diminuite —
